page.title: 03A Ponteland Boy - David
page.content: I am a boy who was born in 1975 which makes me nine years old.I have a sister called Sarah who is seven.I live in the village of Ponteland near Newcastle upon Tyne.My motheris a social worker and my father is a teacher.On Saturday I like to go to the city with my mother and we look round the big shops called department stores.My father likes to play golf,I am interested too.I enjoy swimming but there is not a swimming pool in Ponteland we hope to have one soon.The local newspaper is called the Ponteland Observer.In this you can read about local news,sports events and farming.Ihave about three hundred books because I enjoy reading a lot.On a Sunday I like to help in the garden and if is raining I will do some drawing or write stories which I illustrate as well.
